participant_1.background:
I'm not a big fan of fortune tellers, but I do enjoy Starbucks and Halloween.
i am a military veteran.
My family has a hard time understanding my lifestyle choices.
i m a lesbian.
My social media presence is mostly for my job search, but I do enjoy interacting with friends and family online.

participant_2.background:
I have to work, but I'm bringing my blender to make my own iced coffee!
I sometimes neglect my own needs in order to be there for my kids.
i studied business as my major.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair.
I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well. I'm a teacher and my students have a big test today, so I'm a little nervous for them.
Oh, good luck to your students! I'm sure they'll do great. I'm a military veteran, and I'm currently looking for a job. My social media presence is mostly for that purpose.

That's great that you're a veteran. Thank you for your service! I'm sure you'll find a great job soon. I studied business as my major, and I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success. I also enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair.

That's great that you're a teacher. I'm sure you're a great one. I'm not a big fan of fortune tellers, but I do enjoy Starbucks and Halloween. My family has a hard time understanding my lifestyle choices. I'm a lesbian.

That's okay. Not everyone has to be a fan of fortune tellers. I enjoy Starbucks and Halloween too. I'm sorry to hear that your family has a hard time understanding your lifestyle choices. I'm a lesbian too.
That's great! It's nice to meet someone who understands.
Me too! It's nice to meet you too
